title: The Elves and the Otterskin
description: This is a later printing of the second novel in Boyer's "World of the Alfar" sequence. These novels The Sword and the Satchel (1980); The Elves and the Otterskin (1981); The Thrall and the Dragon's Heart (1982); The Wizard and the Warlord (1983).
author: Elizabeth H. Boyer
